info.name: Girik Marine API (Role-based)
info.description: Postman collection generated from OpenAPI. Folders: Role (Admin, GM, etc.) → Resource (Certificates, Jobs, etc.) → APIs. Admin has all APIs admin can access; same for other roles.

item.name: 0. Auth & Public
item.description: Login (PUBLIC). After login, copy token to collection variable "token".

request.description: Authenticate with email and password. Returns user and JWT token.
Get new access token using refresh token.
Reset password using token from email.
Public vessel verification - no auth required
Public verification of certificate by number. No auth required.

item.name: ADMIN
item.description: All APIs that role ADMIN can access. Grouped by resource (Certificates, Jobs, etc.). Set token after login.

request.description: Returns server health status. No authentication required.
List certificates. CLIENT sees only their vessels' certificates.
Generate a new certificate for a completed job. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get certificates expiring within a date range. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO, CLIENT.
Suspend a certificate. ADMIN, TM only.
Revoke a certificate. ADMIN, TM only.
Restore a suspended certificate. ADMIN, TM only.
Renew an expiring certificate. ADMIN, TM only.
Reissue a certificate (e.g. after loss). ADMIN, TM only.
Get certificate preview/PDF. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO, SURVEYOR, CLIENT.
Digitally sign a certificate. ADMIN, GM only.
Get signature details for a certificate.
List all jobs. CLIENT sees only their vessels' jobs; SURVEYOR sees assigned jobs.
Create a new job request. CLIENT, ADMIN, GM only.
Update job status. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Assign a surveyor to the job. ADMIN, GM only.
Cancel a job. CLIENT, GM, TM, ADMIN.
Put job on hold. GM, TM, ADMIN only.
Resume a held job. GM, TM, ADMIN only.
Create a copy of the job. GM, TM, ADMIN only.
Update job priority. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get status history and audit trail. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Add internal note to job. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Get client-facing messages for the job.
Get internal staff messages. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Send message on job. Supports file attachment via multipart/form-data.
List all clients. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Create a new client. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get client details by ID. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Update client details. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
List all vessels. CLIENT sees only their vessels.
Create a new vessel. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get all vessels for a specific client. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Update vessel details. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
List payments. CLIENT sees only their payments.
Get financial summary. CLIENT, ADMIN, GM only.
Create a new invoice for a job. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Mark an invoice as paid. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Process a refund for a payment. ADMIN, GM only.
Record a partial payment against an invoice. ADMIN, GM, TM only.

Get role-specific dashboard data. Structure varies by user role:
- ADMIN: System-wide stats, pending approvals
- GM: Management dashboard
- TM: Technical manager view
- TO: Technical officer view
- SURVEYOR: Assigned jobs, availability
- CLIENT: Vessel/job overview

Create a new job request. CLIENT, ADMIN, GM only.
Update job status. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Assign a surveyor to the job. ADMIN, GM only.
Reassign job to another surveyor with reason. GM, TM only.
Escalate job to GM or ADMIN. GM, TM, TO only.
Cancel a job. CLIENT, GM, TM, ADMIN.
Put job on hold. GM, TM, ADMIN only.
Resume a held job. GM, TM, ADMIN only.
Create a copy of the job. GM, TM, ADMIN only.
Update job priority. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get status history and audit trail. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Add internal note to job. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Get client-facing messages for the job.
Get internal staff messages. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Send message on job. Supports file attachment via multipart/form-data.
List all clients. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Create a new client. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get client details by ID. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO only.
Update client details. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
List all vessels. CLIENT sees only their vessels.
Create a new vessel. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Get all vessels for a specific client. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Update vessel details. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
List payments. CLIENT sees only their payments.
Get financial summary. CLIENT, ADMIN, GM only.
Create a new invoice for a job. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Mark an invoice as paid. ADMIN, GM, TM only.
Process a refund for a payment. ADMIN, GM only.
Record a partial payment against an invoice. ADMIN, GM, TM only.

Get role-specific dashboard data. Structure varies by user role:
- ADMIN: System-wide stats, pending approvals
- GM: Management dashboard
- TM: Technical manager view
- TO: Technical officer view
- SURVEYOR: Assigned jobs, availability
- CLIENT: Vessel/job overview

item.name: CLIENT
item.description: All APIs that role CLIENT can access. Grouped by resource (Certificates, Jobs, etc.). Set token after login.

request.description: Returns server health status. No authentication required.
List certificates. CLIENT sees only their vessels' certificates.
Get certificates expiring within a date range. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO, CLIENT.
Get certificate preview/PDF. ADMIN, GM, TM, TO, SURVEYOR, CLIENT.
Get signature details for a certificate.
List all jobs. CLIENT sees only their vessels' jobs; SURVEYOR sees assigned jobs.
Create a new job request. CLIENT, ADMIN, GM only.
Cancel a job. CLIENT, GM, TM, ADMIN.
Get client-facing messages for the job.
Send message on job. Supports file attachment via multipart/form-data.
Get current user's client profile. CLIENT role only.
Update current user's client profile. CLIENT role only.
Get dashboard for client users. CLIENT role only.
List all vessels. CLIENT sees only their vessels.
List payments. CLIENT sees only their payments.
Get financial summary. CLIENT, ADMIN, GM only.
